channel.title: Question
channel.description:
Ok, I downloaded a private server, and got it copied into wordpad, how do I get to play on it?
If this is the wrong server then sorry... but plz dont just type "wrong topic" or whatever, unless you have an answer, i need to know

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @mackel mackel
item.description:
@mackel wrote:

um… you open up your client , or using a webclient, for the ip put 127.0.0.1 and port 43594, then go to your folder with your source files in there, then simply double click on your “runserver.bat” or “run.bat” then keep that running and press log in on your client

Read full topic
